Package com.github.nwillc.contracts

This is a collection of contract tests to use with JUnit.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassProvider
    Interface for contracts that require a sample class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComparableContract<T extends java.lang.Comparable>
    This contract checks: compareTo with null argument throws NullPointerException compareTo with argument that can't be cast to correct type throws ClassCastException returns 0 on equality returns less then zero on less then returns greater then zero on greater
    ComparatorContract<T>
    This contract checks: compare with argument that can't be cast to correct type throws ClassCastException returns 0 on equality returns less then zero on less then returns greater then zero on greater Null values throw a NullPointerException (see below) The jdk contract does not specify how nulls are handled.
    EqualsContract<T>
    This contract checks: That all the members of the Equals list are equal to one another That all the members of the NotEquals list are not equal to the others That hashCodes are also consistent as above. That null is safely viewed as not equals Depending on how your equals handles subclasses you should include appropriate examples in your lists.
    ImmutableIteratorContract
    This contract checks for: The iterator's remove throws UnsupportedOperationException
    IteratorContract
    This contract checks for: hasNext does not advance the iterator next advances the iterator hasNext returns false after end of iterator next after end of iterator throws NoSuchElementException
    NoArgConstructorContract
    This contract checks for: Presence of a no argument constructor
    PrivateConstructorContract
    This contract checks for: All constructors are private
    SingletonContract
    This contract checks for: Private constructors only Presence of method: public static Class getInstance()
    UtilityClassContract
    This contract checks for: Private constructors only Class should be final All methods declared should be static
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ComparatorContract.Nulls  

Package com.github.nwillc.contracts Description

This is a collection of contract tests to use with JUnit. Each contract defines methods to test conditions of contracts associated with a jdk class or well known pattern.
